info.summary:
S. Sudarshan works as a Chair Professor in Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering,Indian Institute of Technology,Bombay, and his\her h-index is 43, g-index is 111. His\Her interests are :
 Query Optimization; Database System; Relational Databases; Bottom Up; Concurrency Control;
